metadata.title: MG Whiskey Deeds, MWS, May 2021
metadata.name: MG Whiskey Deeds, MWS, May 2021
metadata.description:
In our endeavor to create a Global Marketplace for Appreciating Assets, Monogram Network Inc. has created the Monogram (MG) Token providing unprecedented access to appreciating assets and a secure purchase, trade and sale opportunity. Starting with a marketplace for whiskey enthusiasts, the MG Token represents a single 220-liter barrel of prime maturing whiskey, authenticated via certification through SGS. During the asset’s five year lifespan, the token will pay out annually 10% of its purchase price. On the fifth year the owner will receive a final payout plus the original principal, after which the token will become inactive.

    Symbol: MGW-0521-3

    Issuance date: Thu Apr 01 2021 00:00:00 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)

    Initial Principal: $900

    Annual payout Date: 4/1

    Maturity: 4/1/2026

    Final Payout: $90

    Insurance: Lloyds of London-LL01335
metadata.creator: Monogram Network, Inc.
